item.title: The C++ Memory Model, or Why We Can't Have Nice Things
item.description: This post gives a brief overview of the memory model problem, its history, and the approach taken by C++. Memory models are a notoriously difficult subject justifying book-length introductions, so many details are left out - I consider this post a refresher on the topic with links to relevant literature.
